JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
fitters for Sprinkler System Installation in Sjælland


We are seeking a team of 4-5 experienced pipefitters to join a major construction project in Zealand. The primary task involves installing sprinkler systems at a prominent site in the Kalundborg area.


By joining us, you will become part of a well-established company specializing in technical services, with projects spanning across Denmark.


What We Offer:
Competitive salary based on qualifications and in accordance with labor agreements
Pension scheme according to current regulations, collective agreement, holiday pay and public holiday compensation
Free accommodation provided during the project
Full-time employment (46 working hours per week)
Requirement: At least one team member per group (5-10 people) must be proficient in English


Your Qualifications
Certified plumber or pipefitter with proven experience in the field
Expertise in sprinkler system installation, and a certificat to prove it.
This is a long-term project, offering the opportunity to work with a professional team on a high-profile site.


Contact Our Consultants:
(Danish/English/German)
Jesper
Email: jcm@jtworks.dk
Phone (DK): +45 61 37 48 01
Phone (DE): +49 151 2057 4353 / WhatsApp
